1. City Council

City Council
============

![2025 City Council Group Photo](https://www.ci.sherman.tx.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=13223 "2025 City Council Group Photo")


* First and third Mondays of each month, except holidays
* City Hall
  City Council Chambers
  220 W Mulberry St
  Sherman, TX 75090
* [View past City Council meetings online](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLuVMVujJztKTfKPmNLH1Hw/featured" "City Council meeting brochure")

[Council District Map](https://experience.arcgis.com/experience/f2ead96f4ef14f19bf2e23767b65d200/ "Council District Map")

The City of Sherman is a home rule municipality of the State of Texas, governed by a Mayor and City Council who are elected by the people of the city. The Mayor and City Council, acting together, are the governing body. All governing body members serve three-year terms. The governing body, being the elected representatives of the people, adopts all ordinances and resolutions and determines the general goals and policies.
